doc.previous: During the 1990s Vanuatu experienced a period of political instability which resulted in a more decentralised government The Vanuatu Mobile Force a paramilitary group attempted a coup in 1996 because of a pay dispute There were allegations of corruption in the government of Maxime Carlot Korman New elections have been called for several times since 1997 most recently in 2004
